forecastday.title: Monday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Rain showers this morning with mostly cloudy conditions during the afternoon hours. High 11C. Winds WSW at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of rain 40%.
forecastday.fcttext: Showers early with some clearing for the afternoon. High 53F. Winds WSW at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of rain 40%.

forecastday.title: Monday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Cloudy with occasional rain late. Low 8C. Winds SSE at 15 to 25 km/h. Chance of rain 70%.
forecastday.fcttext: Cloudy with rain developing after midnight. Low 48F. Winds SE at 10 to 15 mph. Chance of rain 70%.
